alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 8:38PM CST until December 13 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CST FOR CENTRAL CHICOT AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 838 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chicot Junction, or 7 miles northeast of Eudora, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Avon around 845 PM CST. Wayside around 850 PM CST. Greenville, Leland and Metcalfe around 900 PM CST. Tribbett around 905 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Arcola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...and central and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
